thread.title: My baby with Down syndrome taught me joy I had never known
thread.title_full: My baby with Down syndrome taught me joy I had never known

author: Whitney Barthel
title: My baby with Down syndrome taught me joy I had never known
text:
by Whitney Barthel posted in Mom Stories I know I’m probably biased, but my Daniel was the cutest baby. When we received news that Daniel would have Down syndrome halfway through my pregnancy I’m embarrassed to say I was heartbroken. Instead of being happy that he only appeared to have minor health complications, all I... Read more »

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
